title: My Google 3+ is not charging
content:
Phone suddenly turns off itself. When I put it to charge, it shows orange battery life and then suddenly 92%. 

Then when taken off the charging cable, after an hour's charginging time, it shows all 92% all the time and I don't know if it's discharging until it turns off automatically again.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
